tns:patch.author: mpostelnicu
tns:patch.description: We switched from one verified assigned org per user, to multiple per user. This patch should move the previous values into the new separate table.

script.lang: update dg_user set assigned_org_id=null where assigned_org_id not in (select amp_org_id from amp_organisation); insert ignore into dg_user_orgs (user_id,org_id) (select id,assigned_org_id from dg_user where assigned_org_id is not null);
